content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 tablespoon olive oil" )
( ing-1 "1 onion, chopped" )

content.text: 2 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "2 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped" )
( ing-3 "1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced" )
( ing-4 "10 fresh mushrooms, quartered" )
( ing-5 "6 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced" )
( ing-6 "1 cup fresh corn kernels" )
( ing-7 "1 teaspoon ground black pepper" )
( ing-8 "1 teaspoon ground cumin" )
( ing-9 "1 tablespoon chili powder" )

content.text: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed
content.eamr: ( ing-10 "2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed" )
( ing-11 "1 1/2 cups chicken broth" )
( ing-12 "1 teaspoon salt" )

content.text: 0) Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "oil"@8:11 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large saucepan"@15:31 / TOOL )
		:heat ( "medium-high heat"@37:53 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Sautee the onion, red bell peppers, jalapeno, mushrooms, tomatoes and corn for 10 minutes or until the onions are translucent.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Sautee"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the onion"@10:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "red bell peppers"@21:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "jalapeno"@39:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "mushrooms"@49:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "tomatoes"@60:68 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "corn"@73:77 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "10 minutes"@82:92 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until the onions are translucent"@96:128 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Season with black pepper, cumin and chili powder.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Season"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "black pepper"@15:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "cumin"@29:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "chili powder"@39:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Stir in the black beans, chicken broth and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "the black beans"@11:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "chicken broth"@28:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "salt"@46:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Remove 1 1/2 cups of the soup to food processor or blender; puree and stir the bean mixture back into the soup.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( "1 1/2 cups of the soup"@10:32 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "food processor"@36:50 / TOOL )
		:gol ( tool-5-1 "blender"@54:61 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "puree"@63:68 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-2 "stir"@73:77 / AC
		:ppt ( "the bean mixture"@78:94 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "the soup"@105:113 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Serve hot by itself or over rice.
